data.eml:eml: Crozetia Davies (Diptera: Simuliidae): redescription of Cr. crozetensis, Cr. seguyi, number of larval instars, phylogenetic relationships and historical biogeography

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Craig, Douglas A., Currie, Douglas C., Vernon, Philippe (2003): Crozetia Davies (Diptera: Simuliidae): redescription of Cr. crozetensis, Cr. seguyi, number of larval instars, phylogenetic relationships and historical biogeography. Zootaxa 259: 1-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156551
